foreignData.name: Trommelbrüller
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Enttappe während der Enttappsegmente aller anderen Spieler alle Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.name: Beuglebatteur
foreignData.text:
Vol
Dégagez tous les créatures que vous contrôlez pendant l'étape de dégagement de chaque autre joueur.

foreignData.name: 鼓音轟かせ
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなた以外の各プレイヤーのアンタップ・ステップに、あなたがコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーをアンタップする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.name: 擂鼓灵
foreignData.text:
飞行
于每位其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的生物。

name: Drumbellower
originalText:
Flying
Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

rulings.text: Other effects can prevent a creature from untapping during an untap step. You do need to look carefully, however, as many effects say that the creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and this card's ability applies during other players' untap steps. If a card does say this, then Drumbellower can untap it.
All your creatures untap during each other player's untap step. You have no choice about what untaps.

text:
Flying
Untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.
